Translations.Text: Dir Lauxd est DI pac est His servants whom Li chose! Di bon idols kelk popol est set
Who Unu est kre heavens ter? Who est 1 who send down vi cxiel akv whereby ni produkt gxarden plen de beauty! - Vi possibly ne manufacture its arb? est gxi another di DI? Ja ili est popol who deviated
Who Unu far ter habitable kauxz river kur gxi ej gxi mont est kre barrier 2 akv? est gxi another di DI? Ja plej de them ne kon
Who Unu rescues those est igx desperate vok Him relieves adversity far vi inheritors ter? est gxi another di DI? Rarely do vi pren heed
Who Unu est direkt vi darkness land kaj mar? Who Unu est send vent bon news signaling His mercy? est gxi another di DI? exalted est DI hav any partner
Who Unu iniciat creation est tiam ripet gxi? Who Unu est proviz por vi heaven ter? est gxi another di DI? Dir Montr me your proof se vi est truthful
Dir Ne 1 heavens ter kon future escept DI! Ili do ne eben perceive kiel when ili resurrected
En fakt, their knowledge Hereafter konfuz. En fakt, ili haven dub gxi. En fakt, ili est totally heedless thereof
